lead_paragraph: On Nov. 2, voters will pick a replacement for the remaining weeks of President Obama’s original term and choose a new senator to begin a full term on Jan. 3.
snippet: On Nov. 2, voters will pick a replacement for the remaining weeks of President Obama’s original term and choose a new senator to begin a full term on Jan. 3.

headline.main: For One Senate Seat in Illinois, Two Elections on the Same Day
headline.print_headline: For One Senate Seat in Illinois, Two Elections on the Same Day
